title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: Currently, when importing a project, there is no default folder selected. Users have to manually navigate to the desired folder every time they want to import a project.
EB: It would be convenient and time-saving if the import feature could remember the last folder that was used to import a project, and automatically navigate to that folder as the default folder for future imports.
SR: Implement a feature that remembers the last import folder and sets it as the default folder for future imports in the Import Project functionality.
